Package com.aproteam.ioucash.api

Interface IouCashService

public interface IouCashService
An interface defining the API endpoints for the IouCash service. Each of its methods returns concretely typed Call object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    retrofit2.Call<Result>
    addTransaction(UserTransactionRequestParams userTransactionRequestParams)
    Sends a POST request and adds a new transaction.
    retrofit2.Call<User>
    changePassword(ChangeUserPasswordParams changeUserPasswordParams)
    Sends a POST request and changes his password.

    getTransactions()
    Sends a GET request and retrieves a list of transactions.

    getTransactionsByReceiver(String receiverName)
    Sends a GET request and retrieves a list of transactions by the receiver.

    Sends a GET request and retrieves a list of transactions by the sender.

    Sends a POST request and removes a user.

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      @GET("/users") retrofit2.Call<List<User>> getUsers()
      Sends a GET request and retrieves a list of users.
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting to receive a list of users

    • removeUser

      @POST("/users/remove/{name}") retrofit2.Call<Object> removeUser(@Path("name") String username)
      Sends a POST request and removes a user.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user to remove
      Returns:
      A Call object representing the API call

    • register

      @POST("/users/register") retrofit2.Call<User> register(@Body UserAuthorizationParams userAuthorizationParams)
      Sends a POST request and registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      userAuthorizationParams - parameters for user authorization
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting a response representing a user

    • login

      @POST("/users/login") retrofit2.Call<User> login(@Body UserAuthorizationParams userAuthorizationParams)
      Sends a POST request and logs user in.
      Parameters:
      userAuthorizationParams - parameters for user authorization
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting a response representing a user

    • changePassword

      @POST("/users/changePassword") retrofit2.Call<User> changePassword(@Body ChangeUserPasswordParams changeUserPasswordParams)
      Sends a POST request and changes his password.
      Parameters:
      changeUserPasswordParams - parameters for changing the user's password
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting a response representing a user

    • getTransactions

      @GET("/Transaction") retrofit2.Call<List<Transaction>> getTransactions()
      Sends a GET request and retrieves a list of transactions.
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting a response representing a list of transactions

    • removeTransaction

      @DELETE("/removeTransaction/{sender}/{receiver}") retrofit2.Call<Transaction> removeTransaction(@Path("sender") String sender, @Path("receiver") String receiver)
      Sends a DELETE request and removes a transaction.
      Parameters:
      sender - username of the sender
      receiver - username of the receiver
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting a response representing a transaction

    • addTransaction

      @POST("/addTransaction") retrofit2.Call<Result> addTransaction(@Body UserTransactionRequestParams userTransactionRequestParams)
      Sends a POST request and adds a new transaction.
      Parameters:
      userTransactionRequestParams - parameters for the user transaction
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting a response representing a result

    • getTransactionsBySender

      @GET("Transaction/bySender/{sender}") retrofit2.Call<List<Transaction>> getTransactionsBySender(@Path("sender") String senderName)
      Sends a GET request and retrieves a list of transactions by the sender.
      Parameters:
      senderName - username of the sender
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting a response representing a list of transactions

    • getTransactionsByReceiver

      @GET("Transaction/byReceiver/{receiver}") retrofit2.Call<List<Transaction>> getTransactionsByReceiver(@Path("receiver") String receiverName)
      Sends a GET request and retrieves a list of transactions by the receiver.
      Parameters:
      receiverName - username of the receiver
      Returns:
      a Call object representing the API call, expecting a response representing a list of transactions
